Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 12
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.Poster Nr. 12 shows Hu Feng and his accomplice befuddling a person "who has mistakes in his thinking, who is dissatisfied with the CCP, who has historical problems and is extravagant" in an attempt to further his counter-revolutionary movement.
